Indications.

A tyrosine and phenylalanine free drink or gel for use in the dietary management of Tyrosinaemia in children from 12 months to 10 years of age.

Product Features

  • Tyrosine and phenylalanine free
  • Contains the necessary mixture of amino acids, carbohydrates, minerals, trace elements and vitamins to meet the daily nutritional needs of this age group
  • Provides 42g of protein equivalent per 100g of powder
  • Designed to be made into a gel or low volume drink
  • Unflavored powder with separate FlavourPac sachets available

Nutritional Information & Ingredients

Available for download at the end of this page.

Important Information

TYR gel must only be given to patients with proven Tyrosinaemia and under strict medical supervision.  It is not recommended for infants under 12 months of age or as a sole source of nutrition.  The product does contain a source of phenylalanine.  TYR gel is not for parenteral use.

Dosage and Administration

  • Dosage of TYR gel should be determined by the clinician or dietitian
  • The daily protein requirement is given as TYR gel (100g is equivalent to 42g of protein).
  • Additional protein is provided from natural protein sources in medically prescribed quantities to provide phenylalanine and tyrosine in controlled amounts, which is essential for normal development.
  • Foods high in carbohydrate and fat but low in protein should be provided as an energy source to supply the remainder of daily calories.

Guidelines for Preparation and Use

TYR gel can be taken as a gel or as a low volume drink
  1. Empty the contents of a sachet into a beaker (provided), and add a FlavourPac sachet if desired.  Add cold water – 30ml for a gel or half way up the beaker (100ml) for a drink.  Secure the lid and shake for 10 seconds.  For the gel, let stand for 2 minutes.  For the drink, serve immediately.
  2. Water or permitted drinks should be taken after the TYR gel.
  3. Cover and refrigerate any unused formula.  Use prepared formula within 24 hours.  Shake well before serving.

Storage

Store unopened sachets at room temperature.  After opening, store tightly sealed sachet in a cool, dry place and use within one month.  Avoid storing product in areas of extreme temperatures.
